source.35fe90e3:
def grid(data,name,TA,significance,increase,decrease,Initial_Margin,MinVolUnit,transaction_cost,start,end,pct_limit):
    c=name
    n=1/significance
    TP= data.iloc[:786,4].mean()
    g[c]=data.iloc[start:end,:]
    ddc=TP-TP*pct_limit
    rf=0.0025
    g[c]['pctdiff']=np.ceil((g[c].iloc[:,4]/TP-1)*n)/n
    g[c]['TargetAllocation']=1
    g[c]['DDC']=0
    for i in range(1,len(g[c])):
        g[c].loc[i,'DDC']=(g[c].iloc[i,3]<ddc)
        if g[c].loc[i,'DDC']==True:
            g[c].loc[i,"TargetAllocation"]=0
        elif g[c].loc[i,'pctdiff']<0:
            g[c].loc[i,"TargetAllocation"]=max(min(1,TA-g[c].loc[i,'pctdiff']/significance*increase),0)
        else:
            g[c].loc[i,"TargetAllocation"]=max(min(1,TA-g[c].loc[i,'pctdiff']/significance*decrease),0)

    g[c]["Position"]=(Initial_Margin*g[c]["TargetAllocation"]/TP/MinVolUnit).astype(int)*MinVolUnit
    g[c].loc[0,"TradeVol_1"]=g[c].loc[0,"Position"]
    for i in range(1,len(g[c])):
        g[c].loc[i,"TradeVol_1"]=g[c].loc[i,"Position"]-g[c].loc[i-1,"Position"]
    g[c].loc[0,'Transaction_Cost']=0
    for i in range(1,len(g[c])):
        g[c].loc[i,'Transaction_Cost']=abs(g[c].iloc[i,1]*g[c].loc[i-1,"TradeVol_1"]*transaction_cost)
    
    
    g[c].loc[0,'OtherAsset']=0
    for i in range(1,len(g[c])):
        g[c].loc[i,'OtherAsset']=g[c].loc[i-1,'Position']*g[c].iloc[i,4]
    
    g[c].loc[0,'Cash']=Initial_Margin
    for i in range(1,len(g[c])):
        g[c].loc[i,"Cash"]=g[c].loc[i-1,"Cash"]*(1+rf/252)-g[c].loc[i-1,"TradeVol_1"]*g[c].iloc[i,1]-g[c].loc[i,'Transaction_Cost']
    
    g[c]['TotalAsset']=g[c]['OtherAsset']+g[c]['Cash']
    g[c].loc[0,'NAV']=1
    for i in range(1,len(g[c])):
        g[c].loc[i,'NAV']=g[c].loc[i,'TotalAsset']/Initial_Margin
        g[c].loc[i,'NAV_Ret']=g[c].loc[i,'NAV']/g[c].loc[i-1,'NAV']-1
        g[c]['cumret']=g[c]['NAV_Ret'].cumsum()

    SD_daily=stdev(g[c].loc[1:,'NAV_Ret'])
    Return_daily=mean(g[c].loc[1:,'NAV_Ret'])
    annual_return=Return_daily*260
    annual_SD=SD_daily*(260**(1/2))
    if annual_SD < 0.001:
        annual_SD=0.001
    pass
    RR_ratio=annual_return/annual_SD
    return(g[c])
source.9d7acf4d:
performance_eva=rocket.iloc[:,[0,126]]
performance_eva=performance_eva.fillna(0)
cumulative_return=[]
cumulative_return.append(0)
for i in range(1,len(performance_eva)):
    cumulative_return.append(cumulative_return[i-1]+performance_eva.iloc[i,1].astype(float))
performance_eva['cum_return']=cumulative_return

## calculate max DD
maxdd_nostoploss=[]
for i in range(len(performance_eva)):
    maxdd_nostoploss.append(min((performance_eva.iloc[i,2]-max(performance_eva.iloc[0:i+1,2])),0))
performance_eva['max_DD']=maxdd_nostoploss

## calculate winning rate
winner=[]
for i in range(len(performance_eva)):
    if performance_eva.iloc[i,1]>0:
        winner.append(1)
    else:
        winner.append(0)


print('our strategy annual return is '+str(performance_eva['daily_return'].mean()*252))
print('our strategy annual standard deviation is '+ str(stdev(performance_eva['daily_return'])*(252**0.5)))
print('our strategy RR ratio is '+str((performance_eva['daily_return'].mean()*252)/(stdev(performance_eva['daily_return'])*(252**0.5))))
print('our strategy max DD is '+ str(performance_eva['max_DD'].min()))
print('our strategy winning rate is '+ str(sum(winner)/len(performance_eva)))

source.64dc5828:
def grid_optimized(data,name,TA,significance,increase,decrease,Initial_Margin,MinVolUnit,transaction_cost,sample_days,pct_limit):
    c=name
    g[c]=data
    n=1/significance
    t=sample_days
    TP= g[c].iloc[:t,4].mean()
    ddc=TP-TP*pct_limit
    rf=0.0025
    g[c]['pctdiff']=np.ceil((g[c].iloc[:,4]/TP-1)*n)/n
    g[c]['TargetAllocation']=1
    g[c]['DDC']=0
    for i in range(1,t):
        g[c].loc[i,'DDC']=(g[c].iloc[i,3]<ddc)
        if g[c].loc[i,'DDC']==True:
            g[c].loc[i,"TargetAllocation"]=0
        elif g[c].loc[i,'pctdiff']<0:
            g[c].loc[i,"TargetAllocation"]=max(min(1,TA-g[c].loc[i,'pctdiff']/significance*increase),0)
        else:
            g[c].loc[i,"TargetAllocation"]=max(min(1,TA-g[c].loc[i,'pctdiff']/significance*decrease),0)

    g[c]["Position"]=(Initial_Margin*g[c]["TargetAllocation"]/TP/MinVolUnit).astype(int)*MinVolUnit
    g[c].loc[0,"TradeVol_1"]=g[c].loc[0,"Position"]
    for i in range(1,t):
        g[c].loc[i,"TradeVol_1"]=g[c].loc[i,"Position"]-g[c].loc[i-1,"Position"]
    g[c].loc[0,'Transaction_Cost']=0
    for i in range(1,t):
        g[c].loc[i,'Transaction_Cost']=abs(g[c].iloc[i,1]*g[c].loc[i-1,"TradeVol_1"]*transaction_cost)
    
    
    g[c].loc[0,'OtherAsset']=0
    for i in range(1,t):
        g[c].loc[i,'OtherAsset']=g[c].loc[i-1,'Position']*g[c].iloc[i,4]
    
    g[c].loc[0,'Cash']=Initial_Margin
    for i in range(1,t):
        g[c].loc[i,"Cash"]=g[c].loc[i-1,"Cash"]*(1+rf/252)-g[c].loc[i-1,"TradeVol_1"]*g[c].iloc[i,1]-g[c].loc[i,'Transaction_Cost']
    
    g[c]['TotalAsset']=g[c]['OtherAsset']+g[c]['Cash']
    g[c].loc[0,'NAV']=1
    for i in range(1,t):
        g[c].loc[i,'NAV']=g[c].loc[i,'TotalAsset']/Initial_Margin
        g[c].loc[i,'NAV_Ret']=g[c].loc[i,'NAV']/g[c].loc[i-1,'NAV']-1
        g[c]['cumret']=g[c]['NAV_Ret'].cumsum()

    SD_daily=stdev(g[c].loc[:t,'NAV_Ret'])
    Return_daily=mean(g[c].loc[:t:,'NAV_Ret'])
    annual_return=Return_daily*260
    annual_SD=SD_daily*(260**(1/2))
    if annual_SD < 0.001:
        annual_SD=0.001
    pass
    RR_ratio=annual_return/annual_SD
    return(RR_ratio,pct_limit)

for i in range(39):
    grid_SD_eachstock=[]
    for j in range(35,55):
        grid_SD_eachstock.append(grid_optimized(df_merged.iloc[:,[0,4*i+1,4*i+2,4*i+3,4*i+4]],asset_list[i],0.3,0.0001,0.1,0.1,10000,1,0,786,j/100))

    pick=collection.iloc[0,1]
